componentMetadata.docblock:
A form input with a label that can display error messages.

Props:
`errorMessage` - Error string to display in the component.
                 When defined, indicates input has a validation error.
`label` - String for the input field label.
`name` - String for the input name attribute.
`tabIndex` - Number for keyboard tab order.
`autocomplete` - String for the input autocomplete attribute.
`placeholder` - placeholder string for input field.
`required` - boolean. Render marker indicating field is required.
`field` - string. Value of the input field.
`additionalClass` - Extra attribute for use by CSS selector, specifically
                    by tests
`onValueChange` - a function with this prototype: (newValue)

childrenComponentProp.name: errorMessage
childrenComponentProp.docblock: display error message for input that indicates a validation error

childrenComponentProp.name: placeholder
childrenComponentProp.docblock: text displayed when input has no user provided value

childrenComponentProp.name: required
childrenComponentProp.docblock: render marker indicating field is required

childrenComponentProp.name: field
childrenComponentProp.docblock: value of the input field and if its dirty status

childrenComponentProp.name: additionalClass
childrenComponentProp.docblock: extra attribute for use by CSS selector, specifically by tests

childrenComponentProp.name: onValueChange
childrenComponentProp.docblock: called when input value is changed
